name: micro-focus-service-manager
label: Micro Focus Service Manager
description: Micro Focus service manager connector helps you to create incident, update incident, list incidents, get incident, get device list and get device

fields.title: Server URL
fields.tooltip: The host or domain name on which the service is available.
fields.description: Host or domain name on which the service is available.
fields.name: host

fields.title: Initial Path
fields.tooltip: Initial path that is part of the URI for a given deployment. This value should start with /SM/9/rest.
fields.description: Initial path that is the path of URI for a given deployment. This value should start with /SM/9/rest
fields.name: path

fields.title: Username
fields.description: Username used to connect to the Micro Focus Service Manager server to which you will connect and perform automated operations
fields.name: username

fields.title: Password
fields.description: Password used to connect to the Micro Focus Service Manager server to which you will connect and perform automated operations
fields.name: password

fields.title: Port
fields.tooltip: TCP port number on which service is available
fields.description: TCP port number on which service is available.
fields.name: port

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not
fields.description:
Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.
By default, this option is set as True.
fields.name: verify_ssl

operations.title: Create Incident
operations.description: Creates a new incident on the Micro Focus Service Manager server, based on the input parameters you have specified

parameters.title: Title
parameters.tooltip: The title of incident
parameters.description: Title of the incident that you want to create on the Micro Focus Service Manager server.
parameters.name: title

parameters.title: Description
parameters.tooltip: Description of the incident
parameters.description: Description of the incident that you want to create on the Micro Focus Service Manager server.
parameters.name: description

parameters.title: Impact
parameters.tooltip: Impact value to be assigned to the incident
parameters.description:
Impact value to be assigned to the incident that you want to create on the Micro Focus Service Manager server.
You can choose from the following options: Enterprises, Site/Dept, Multiple Users, or User.
By default, this is set as User.
parameters.name: impact

parameters.title: Urgency
parameters.tooltip: Urgency value to be assigned to the incident
parameters.description:
Urgency value to be assigned to the incident that you want to create on the Micro Focus Service Manager server.
You can choose from the following options: Critical, High, Average, or Low.
By default, this is set as Low.
parameters.name: urgency

parameters.title: Category
parameters.tooltip: Category of incident
parameters.description:
Category to be assigned to the incident that you want to create on the Micro Focus Service Manager server.
For example, Incident, Complaint, etc.
Note: Category values can be added in lowercase.
parameters.name: category

parameters.title: Primary Affected Service
parameters.tooltip: ID of the primary service that has been affected by the incident
parameters.description:
ID of the primary service that has been affected by the incident that you want to create on the Micro Focus Service Manager server.
For example, CI1001020
parameters.name: service

parameters.title: Affected CI
parameters.tooltip: ID of the service component(s) that have been affected by the incident
parameters.description:
(Optional) ID of the service component(s) that have been affected by the incident that you want to create on the Micro Focus Service Manager server.
For example, CI1000783
parameters.name: affected_ci

parameters.title: Subcategory
parameters.tooltip: Subcategory to be assigned to the incident
parameters.description: (Optional) Subcategory to be assigned to the incident that you want to create on the Micro Focus Service Manager server
parameters.name: subcategory

parameters.title: Area
parameters.tooltip: The area. Example: performance, failure, hardware, access
parameters.description:
(Optional) Area to be assigned to the incident that you want to create on the Micro Focus Service Manager server.
For example, performance, failure, hardware, access, etc.
parameters.name: area

parameters.title: Assignment Group
parameters.tooltip: Assignment Group to assign created incident
parameters.description:
(Optional) Assignment Group to whom the incident that you want to create on the Micro Focus Service Manager server should be assigned.
For example, Office Supplies (North America).
parameters.name: assignment_group

parameters.title: Source
parameters.tooltip: Source of the incident
parameters.description:
(Optional) Source of the incident that you want to create on the Micro Focus Service Manager server.
You can choose from the following options: User, Group, Event, Chat, E-mail, or Telephone.
By default, this is set as User.
parameters.name: source

parameters.title: Contact Person
parameters.tooltip: Name of the person to contact for information about the incident
parameters.description: (Optional) Name of the person to contact for information about the incident that you want to create on the Micro Focus Service Manager server.
parameters.name: contact_person

parameters.title: Outage Start Time
parameters.tooltip: Time in format of MM/DD/YY HH:MM:SS Eg.08/24/18 03:30:00
parameters.description:
(Optional) Start time of the outage due to the incident that you want to create on the Micro Focus Service Manager server.
You must enter the time in the format MM/DD/YY HH:MM:SS
For example, 08/24/18 03:30:00.
parameters.name: outage_start_time

parameters.title: Outage End Time
parameters.tooltip: Time in format of MM/DD/YY HH:MM:SS Eg.08/24/18 03:30:00
parameters.description:
(Optional) End time of the outage due to the incident that you want to create on the Micro Focus Service Manager server.
You must enter the time in the format MM/DD/YY HH:MM:SS
For example, 08/24/18 05:30:00.
parameters.name: outage_end_time

parameters.title: Assignee
parameters.tooltip: Eg. Admin.General
parameters.description: (Optional) Name of the assignee of the incident that you want to create on the Micro Focus Service Manager server.
parameters.name: assignee

parameters.title: Service Recipient
parameters.tooltip: Service recipient name
parameters.description: (Optional) Name of the service recipient of the incident that you want to create on the Micro Focus Service Manager server.
parameters.name: service_recipient

parameters.title: Location
parameters.tooltip: Location where the incident occurred
parameters.description: (Optional) Location where the incident occurred that you want to create on the Micro Focus Service Manager server.For example, Africa, Asia, Europe.
parameters.name: location

parameters.title: Solution
parameters.tooltip: Solution (if available) to the incident
parameters.description: (Optional) Solution (if available) to the incident that occurred and that you want to create on the Micro Focus Service Manager server.
parameters.name: solution

parameters.title: Additional Fields
parameters.tooltip: JSON dictionary to add extra input parameters
parameters.description:
(Optional) Additional fields that you want to add to the incident record that you want to create on the Micro Focus Service Manager server.
You must add the additional fields in the JSON Dictionary format.
parameters.name: json_input

operations.title: Get Incident List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of incidents from the Micro Focus Service Manager server, based on the query and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Query
parameters.tooltip: Example. Category="incident" and (Title="Desktop screen out of order" or Title="Network logon failure")
parameters.description:
Query (or filter) that you use to specify the search criteria, based on which you want to retrieve incidents from the Micro Focus Service Manager server.
For example, Category = "incident", Title = "Desktop screen out of order"
parameters.name: query

parameters.title: Sort
parameters.tooltip: Returns the collection members in sorted order according to the arguments specified.
parameters.description:
Sorts the result of the operation, i.e., the list of incidents retrieved from the Micro Focus Service Manager server, based on the sort fields you have specified.
For example, Urgency:ascending,field2:descending
parameters.name: sort

parameters.title: Start
parameters.tooltip: Start index of collection response, should begins with 1
parameters.description: Index of the member from which the collection response representation begins
parameters.name: start

parameters.title: Count
parameters.tooltip: Indicates the number of collection members to be included in the response
parameters.description: Number of collection members to be returned by this operation.
parameters.name: count

parameters.title: View
parameters.tooltip: Represents a collection.
parameters.description:
View of the collection that is returned by this operation.
You can choose from the following options: Summary, Condense, or Expand.
By default, this is set as Expand.
parameters.name: view

operations.title: Update Change
operations.description: Updates an existing change for closure in Service Manager based on the change ID, closure code, phase, and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Change ID
parameters.tooltip: ID of the change request, you want to close
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the change request that you want to update for closure in the Micro Focus Service Manager server.
parameters.name: change_id

parameters.title: Closure Code
parameters.tooltip: Closure Code for the change request
parameters.description: Specify the closure code that you want to apply to the change request that you want to update for closure in the Micro Focus Service Manager server.
parameters.name: ClosureCode

parameters.title: SubClosure Code
parameters.tooltip: Sub Closure Code for the change request
parameters.description: Specify the sub-closure code that you want to apply to the change request that you want to update for closure in the Micro Focus Service Manager server.

parameters.title: Closing Comments
parameters.tooltip: Closing Comments for the change you want to close
parameters.description: Specify the closing comments that you want to add to the change request that you want to update for closure in the Micro Focus Service Manager server.
parameters.name: ClosingComments

parameters.title: Phase

parameters.description: Specify the phase of the change request that you want to update for closure in the Micro Focus Service Manager server. You can specify phases such as logging, approve, close, etc.
parameters.name: Phase

parameters.title: Actual Start Time

parameters.title: Actual End Time
parameters.description: (Optional) Enter the actual end DateTime of the change request that you want to update for closure in the Micro Focus Service Manager server.
parameters.name: PlannedEnd
